text: <span style='color:#006699'><span style='font-size:20px'>Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?
little interest or pleasure in doing things?
Answers: Not at all|Several days|More than half the days|Nearly every day

text: Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much?
Answers: Not at all|Several days|More than half the days|Nearly every day

text: Feeling tired or having little energy?
Answers: Not at all|Several days|More than half the days|Nearly every day
Not at all|Several days|More than half the days|Nearly every day

text: Feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down?
Answers: Not at all|Several days|More than half the days|Nearly every day

text: Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching the television?
Answers: Not at all|Several days|More than half the days|Nearly every day

text: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual?
Answers: Not at all|Several days|More than half the days|Nearly every day

text: Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself in some way?
Answers: Not at all|Several days|More than half the days|Nearly every day

text: How much have you been shamed or stigmatised for the above behaviour?
